evidence_collection.quote_text: Mr. President, it's been perhaps one of the greatest honors of my life, easily one of the greatest honors as a senator, to work in a bipartisan coalition over the last five years to get to this point.

evidence_collection.quote_text: We share those common values because we still live in a a nation where the ties that bind us are stronger than the lines that divide us.

evidence_collection.quote_text: As Bryan Stevenson has said, we live in a nation that treats you better if you're rich and guilty than if you're poor and innocent.

evidence_collection.quote_text: But if you are black, you are almost four times more likely to get arrested for selling drugs and almost three times more likely to be arrested for possession of drugs.
